entry.title: Pashinyan criticizes Russia at press conference amid Karabakh blockade

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan criticizes Russia at press conference amid Karabakh blockade
media:group.media:description:
There has been no official offer for Armenia to join the Russian-led Union State, said Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan during a press conference today, adding that the independence and sovereignty of Armenia are absolutes for his government.
Credits: Ruptly

entry.title: Why are Azerbaijanโs demands in Karabakh unacceptable for the Armenian side?

media:group.media:title: Why are Azerbaijanโs demands in Karabakh unacceptable for the Armenian side?
media:group.media:description:
CivilNet contributor Tigran Grigoryan sat down with Emilio Cricchio to discuss the ramifications of Azerbaijanโs month-long blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh. Grigoryan explains what exactly Azerbaijan wants from the Armenian sides, the current state of negotiations, and whether the Russian peacekeeping contingent in Karabakh is unable or unwilling to lift the blockade.

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ, ีซึีฅีถ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีฅีฌีธีพ ีชีธีฒีธีพึีคีกีพีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีซ ีดีกีฝ, ีฐีกีฏีกีคึีพีฅึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซีถ ีธึ ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีซีถ: ิฑึึีฅีฌึีธึีด ีฉีธึีฌีกึีถีฅีฌีธีพ ีซึ ีคีซึึีฅึีจี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีนีฏีกึีธีฒีกึีกีพ ีกีตีฌีจีถีฟึีกีถึ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ ิฑึึีดีธึีฟึีธึีด: ิตึีฏีธึ ีกีฉีธีผีซ ีพึีก ีถีฝีฟีฅีฌีธึ ึีธีญีกึีฅีถ ีจีถีฏีกีถึ ีคึีกีถึ ีกึีกีถึีจโค ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีีฉีฅีถึีธึีคีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฌีฝีกึีกีถีซ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีธีฏีฟีธึ ิฑึีฉีธึึ ิฝีกีนีซีฏีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีพีฅีฌ ีง ีฎีกีถึ ีกีพีถีฟีกีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ีดีกึีฟีกีฐึีกีพีฅึีถีฅึีซ ีกีผีกีป, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีนีซ ึีกีถีฏีกีถีธึีด ีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถีกีฟีพีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฝีฟีกีถีฑีถีฅีฌ: ิปีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีถีก, ีฅึีฏีธึ ีดีฅีฒีกีพีธึ ีฏีกี ีถีกีญีฏีซีถีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ:

entry.title: Food shortages in Artsakh cause kindergartens to shut their doors

media:group.media:title: Food shortages in Artsakh cause kindergartens to shut their doors
media:group.media:description:
Azerbaijanโs blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh has entered its 29th day. The region's 120,000 residents are unable to travel to Armenia, while facing shortages of foodstuffs and medicine. Nurseries and kindergartens will be suspending activities starting today due to food supply shortages. However, Public schools continue to remain open.
